data_table.description: Sleep Heart Health Study (SHHS) ECG Data, Original and Offspring Cohorts 1998 - 2003

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: SHARe ID number

variable.name: lvh3_1_s1
variable.description: Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) voltage for first sleep study

variable.name: lvh3_3_s1
variable.description: Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) voltage for first sleep study

variable.name: st4_1_3_s1
variable.description: S-T junction and S-T segment depression and T-wave items for first sleep study

variable.name: st5_1_3_s1
variable.description: S-T junction and S-T segment depression and T-wave items for first sleep study

variable.name: lvhst_s1
variable.description: Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) with S-T,T-wave abnormality for first sleep study

variable.name: mob1_s1
variable.description: Mobitz 1 for first sleep study

variable.name: part2deg_s1
variable.description: Partial 2nd degree for first sleep study

variable.name: mob2_s1
variable.description: Mobitz II for first sleep study

variable.name: av3deg_s1
variable.description: 3rd degree AV block for sleep study

variable.name: av1deg_s1
variable.description: 1st degree AV block for first sleep study

variable.name: lbbb_s1
variable.description: Left bundle branch block for first sleep study

variable.name: rbbb_s1
variable.description: Right bundle branch block for first sleep study

variable.name: ilbbb_s1
variable.description: Incomplete left bundle branch block for first sleep study

variable.name: irbbb_s1
variable.description: Incomplete right bundle branch block for first sleep study

variable.name: lah_s1
variable.description: Left anterior hemiblock for first sleep study

variable.name: iventblk_s1
variable.description: Intraventricular block pattern indeterminate for first sleep study

variable.name: wpw_s1
variable.description: Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome for first sleep study

variable.name: antsepmi_s1
variable.description: Anteroseptal myocardial infarction (MI) for first sleep study

variable.name: infmi_s1
variable.description: Inferior myocardial infarction (MI) for first sleep study

variable.name: antlatmi_s1
variable.description: Anterolateral myocardial infarction (MI) for first sleep study

variable.name: nonsp_st_s1
variable.description: Nonspecific S-T abnormality for first sleep study

variable.name: nonsp_tw_s1
variable.description: Nonspecific T-wave abnormality for first sleep study

variable.name: rtrial_s1
variable.description: Right atrial enlargement for first sleep study

variable.name: rvh_s1
variable.description: Right ventricular hypertrophy for first sleep study

variable.name: ventrate_s1
variable.description: Ventricular rate for first sleep study

variable.name: qrs_s1
variable.description: QRS axis for first sleep study

variable.name: afib_s1
variable.description: Atrial fibrillation/flutter for first sleep study

variable.description: Paced for first sleep study

variable.name: nodal_s1
variable.description: Nodal rhythm for first sleep study

variable.name: apbs_s1
variable.description: Atrial premature beats for first sleep study

variable.name: vpbs_s1
variable.description: Ventricular premature beats for first sleep study

variable.name: truposmi_s1
variable.description: True posterior myocardial infarction (MI) for first sleep study

variable.description: Framingham cohort identifier

variable.name: ecgdate_s1
variable.description: Date of ECG for first sleep study
variable.comment: ECGDATE_S1 modified - Number of days since Exam 1
variable.value: Unknown or did not have ECG for first sleep study

variable.name: ecgdate_s2
variable.description: Date of ECG for second sleep study
variable.comment: ECGDATE_S2 modified - Number of days since Exam 1
variable.value: Unknown or did not have ECG for second sleep study

variable.name: psgdate_s1
variable.description: Date of PSG for first sleep study
variable.comment: PSGDATE_S1 modified - Number of days since Exam 1
variable.value: Unknown or did not have first sleep study

variable.name: psgdate_s2
variable.description: Date of PSG for second sleep study
variable.comment: PSGDATE_S2 modified - Number of days since Exam 1
variable.value: Unknown or did not have second sleep study
